title: fix(social): upload Discord images as file attachments
author: ElliotEtag

gist.summary: Updated the Discord notification bot to upload images as direct file attachments rather than embed URLs.
gist.impact: Ensures images in Discord announcements display reliably without timeout errors.
gist.visual_concept: A cute pixel art robot (representing the Discord bot) carefully placing a physical photograph into a frame, symbolizing the switch to direct file uploads.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a tiny robot placing a photo into a frame on a wall. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting. The Pollinations bee watches happily. Lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful.
